allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat\(auth\): add guest mode, fix Apple Sign-In, update app identifiers

- Add guest mode support to auth_state_notifier for browsing without login
- Fix Apple Sign-In on Android by adding webAuthenticationOptions
- Change Android applicationId/namespace to app.campusnerds.app
- Move MainActivity.kt to app/campusnerds/app package
- Change iOS bundle identifier to app.campusnerds.app

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C c:/dev/campus_nerds commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix\(ui\): checkout page refactor, city selector, booking confirmation fixes

Checkout page:
- Add login validation before purchase
- Fix button height \(56px -> 48px\) and color \(primary -> alternate\)
- Add ticket expiration notice text
- Fix product ordering \(ascending by pack_size\)

City selector:
- Fix city ordering with predefined order
- Fix title alignment \(left-aligned\)
- Add useRootNavigator for bottom sheet

Booking confirmation:
- Fix confirm button visibility \(move outside Expanded\)
- Update button styling to match FlutterFlow

Router:
- Add parentNavigatorKey to non-navbar routes

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C c:/dev/campus_nerds commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat\(facebook\): sync friends before grouping, remove manual sync button

- Remove manual "sync friends" button from Facebook binding UI
- Remove syncFacebookFriends from repository interface \(sync is now server-side only\)
- Add confirm-group Edge Function for staff to sync friends before confirming groups
- Add migration to switch cron job from SQL function to Edge Function via pg_net
- Friends are now synced at: \(1\) initial binding, \(2\) auto-grouping cron, \(3\) staff confirmation

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C "c:/dev/campus_nerds" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat\(my_events\): add profile popup on StudyPlanCard header tap

Tapping "書呆子 [nickname]" in StudyPlanCard now shows a floating
profile card with avatar, name, university, and age. Added gender,
universityName, and age fields to GroupFocusedPlan entity and updated
both RPC functions to return these profile fields.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C "c:/dev/campus_nerds" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat\(chat\): add profile popup on chat sender name tap

Extract shared ProfilePopupOverlay widget from StudyPlanCard into
common/widgets/profile_popup.dart for reuse. Tapping "書呆子 [nickname]"
in chat messages now shows the same profile popup card with avatar,
name, university, and age. Updated chat_fetch_timeline_page RPC to
return sender profile fields via LEFT JOIN on user_profile_v.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
